verses.text: \w Rebuke|strong="G1969"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* an \w elder|strong="G4245"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w intreat|strong="G3870"\w* \add him\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w father|strong="G3962"\w*; \add and\add* the younger \w men|strong="G3501"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*;

The elder \w women|strong="G4245"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w mothers|strong="G3384"\w*; the \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w sisters|strong="G0079"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w purity|strong="G0047"\w*.
\w Honour|strong="G5091"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* that \w are|strong="G3689"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3689"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w nephews|strong="G1549"\w*, let them \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* to shew \w piety|strong="G2151"\w* at \w home|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G0591"\w* \w requite|strong="G0287"\w* their \w parents|strong="G4269"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G0587"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* she \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3689"\w* a \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3689"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w desolate|strong="G3443"\w*, \w trusteth|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* continueth \w in|strong="G4357"\w* \w supplications|strong="G1162"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* she \w that|strong="G3588"\w* liveth in \w pleasure|strong="G4684"\w* is \w dead|strong="G2348"\w* while she \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* give in \w charge|strong="G3853"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0423"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w provide|strong="G4306"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G4306"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w specially|strong="G3122"\w* for those of his own \w house|strong="G3609"\w*, he hath \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* than an \w infidel|strong="G0571"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G2639"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* a \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* be taken into the \w number|strong="G2639"\w* \w under|strong="G1640"\w* \w threescore|strong="G1835"\w* years \w old|strong="G2094"\w*, having \w been|strong="G1096"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*,

Well reported \w of|strong="G3140"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*; \w if|strong="G1487"\w* she have brought up \w children|strong="G5044"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* she have lodged \w strangers|strong="G3580"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* she have \w washed|strong="G3538"\w* the \w saints’|strong="G0040"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* she have \w relieved|strong="G1884"\w* the \w afflicted|strong="G2346"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* she have diligently \w followed|strong="G1872"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3868"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they have begun to wax wanton \w against|strong="G2691"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, they \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*;

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w damnation|strong="G2917"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they have cast \w off|strong="G0114"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w withal|strong="G0260"\w* they \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \add to be\add* \w idle|strong="G0692"\w*, wandering \w about|strong="G4022"\w* from house to \w house|strong="G3614"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w idle|strong="G0692"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w tattlers|strong="G5397"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w busybodies|strong="G4021"\w*, \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* they \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

I \w will|strong="G1014"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G1060"\w* the younger \w women|strong="G3501"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, bear \w children|strong="G5041"\w*, guide the \w house|strong="G3616"\w*, \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w none|strong="G3367"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* to the \w adversary|strong="G0480"\w* to speak \w reproachfully|strong="G3059"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w are|strong="G1624"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* turned \w aside|strong="G1624"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G4103"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w woman|strong="G4103"\w* that \w believeth|strong="G4103"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w*, let them \w relieve|strong="G1884"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G0916"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* be \w charged|strong="G0916"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it may \w relieve|strong="G1884"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3689"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3689"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0515"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* that \w rule|strong="G4291"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* be counted \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w* of \w double|strong="G1362"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* they who \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G5392"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w muzzle|strong="G5392"\w* the \w ox|strong="G1016"\w* that treadeth out the \w corn|strong="G0248"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w*, The \w labourer|strong="G2040"\w* \add is\add* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w*.

\w Against|strong="G2596"\w* an \w elder|strong="G4245"\w* \w receive|strong="G3858"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* an \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w*, \w but|strong="G1622"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

Them that \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w others|strong="G3062"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2192"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*.

I \w charge|strong="G1263"\w* \add thee\add* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou \w observe|strong="G5442"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* preferring one before \w another|strong="G4299"\w*, \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w partiality|strong="G4346"\w*.

\w Lay|strong="G2007"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G5030"\w* \w on|strong="G2007"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* be partaker \w of|strong="G2841"\w* other \w men’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*: \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w pure|strong="G0053"\w*.

\w Drink|strong="G5202"\w* no \w longer|strong="G3371"\w* \w water|strong="G5202"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* a \w little|strong="G3641"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w stomach’s|strong="G4751"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w often|strong="G4437"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*.

\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w men’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* open \w beforehand|strong="G4271"\w*, going \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \add men\add* they follow \w after|strong="G1872"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G5615"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \add of some\add* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* manifest \w beforehand|strong="G4271"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w are|strong="G2192"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G0247"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w hid|strong="G2928"\w*.
